name: The North Face Chilkat 400 II Winter Boots - Men's
description: Dependable protection in the coldest conditions. This waterproof winter boot has 400g insulation for snowy walks to work or mid-winter snowshoe trips. Dual-density footbeds cushion through harsh terrain, while its compression-moulded midsole absorbs impact to keep a spring in your step.Waterproof nubuck leather and injection-moulded TPR shell upper ensures snow and water stay on the outside.400g PrimaLoft® Silver Eco insulation keeps your feet warm.Lace-up closure with gusseted tongue.Dual-density footbed is softer under forefoot and heel for comfort.Compression-moulded EVA midsole cushions impacts.Non-marking Winter Grip® rubber outsole with IcePick® temperature-sensitive lugs for non-slip traction and stability on snow and ice.Manufacturer's suggested temperature rating of -40°C for active use.
